src:
Kunjungan Turis Asing ke RI Turun 10% di September Jadi 1,4 Juta
01 Nov 2019, 03:49 by Danang Sugianto


Ilustrasi/Foto: BBC Magazine

Jakarta - Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) mencatat jumlah wisatawan mancanegara (wisman) pada September 2019 sebanyak 1,4 juta orang. Angka itu turun dibandingkan dengan bulan sebelumnya.Kepala BPS Suhariyanto mengatakan jumlah kedatangan turis asing di September 2019 turun sebesar 10,10% dari bulan sebelumnya."Jumlah wisman 1,4 juta ini memang menurun dibandingkan posisi Agustus karena peak season. Jadi turun 10,10%," ujarnya di Gedung BPS Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Meski begitu, jika dibandingkan dengan September 2018 jumlah kedatangan wisman naik 2,15%. Tercatat jumlah wisman di September 2018 mencapai 1,37 juta kunjungan.Jumlah kunjungan wisman di September 2019 itu melalui pintu masuk udara sebanyak 902,19 ribu kunjungan, pintu masuk laut 332,32 ribu kunjungan dan pintu masuk darat sebanyak 165,86 ribu kunjungan.Jumlah kunjungan yang melalui pintu masuk udara itu mengalami penurunan 1% dibandingkan bulan yang sama di tahun sebelumnya. Penurunan jumlah wisman itu terjadi di sepuluh pintu masuk udara. Penurunan tertinggi terjadi di Bandara Sultan Iskandar Muda sebesar 22,45%, Bandara Juanda turun 16,57%, Bandara Adi Sucipto turun 15,12%. Simak Video "Target Wisman 2018 ke Indonesia Belum Tercapai, Kenapa?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](das/ara)
text:
Foreign Tourist Visits to RI Down 10% in September to 1.4 Million
Nov 01 2019, 03:49 by Danang Sugianto


Illustration / Photo: BBC Magazine

Jakarta - The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) recorded the number of foreign tourists (tourists) in September 2019 as many as 1.4 million people. That figure is down compared to the previous month. Head of BPS Suhariyanto said the number of foreign tourist arrivals in September 2019 fell by 10.10% from the previous month. "The number of 1.4 million foreign tourists is down compared to the position in August due to peak season. So it decreased by 10, 10%, "he said at the BPS Building Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). Even so, when compared to September 2018 the number of foreign tourist arrivals rose 2.15%. Noted the number of foreign tourists in September 2018 reached 1.37 million visits. The number of foreign tourists visiting in September 2019 through the air entrance as many as 902.19 thousand visits, sea entrances 332.32 thousand visits and land entrances as many as 165.86 thousand visits. The number of visits through the air entrance decreased 1% compared to the same month in the previous year. The decline in the number of foreign tourists took place at ten air entrances. The highest decrease occurred at Sultan Iskandar Muda Airport by 22.45%, Juanda Airport fell 16.57%, Adi Sucipto Airport fell 15.12%. Watch Video "2018 Tourists' Target to Indonesia Has Not Yet Been Reached, Why?" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (das / ara)
